patterns: What is the name of the College?
What is the college known for?
responses: The name of our college is Sri Krishna College of Technology.

patterns: What is the NIRF ranking of the College?
How is the college ranked in NIRF?
responses: We have secured the NIRF ranking band of #151-200 in the 2023-24 rankings.

patterns: What are the departments in the college?
List the departments at the college
What engineering departments does the college have?
responses: We have various engineering departments such as Civil, Mechanical, EEE, ECE, Computer Science, AIDS, and Information Technology. Visit this page for a detailed catalogue: https://skct.edu.in/academics/departments/

patterns: What courses does the college offer?
Tell me more about the courses available
What are the academic programs provided?
responses: We offer undergraduate courses in engineering disciplines like Civil, Mechanical, EEE, ECE, Computer Science, AIDS, and Information Technology. For more details, visit: https://skct.edu.in/academics/departments/

patterns: How can I get admitted to the college?
What qualifications do I need to apply?
responses: Admission requirements typically include a HSC Certificate or a Diploma.

patterns: Does the college have housing options?
responses: Of course! We have a dormitory available for all students within the campus, including services like food, water, and cloth washing. More details are available here: https://skct.edu.in/campus-tour/hostel/

patterns: How can I visit the college website?
Give me the link to the college's official site.
responses: You can view our website here: https://skct.edu.in/

patterns: What sporting activities does the college offer?
Are there sports teams in the college?
Tell me about the sports facilities at the college.
responses: Absolutely! We have various sporting activities such as Track and Field, Cricket, Football, Basketball, Kabaddi, Long Jump, Shot Put, etc. Visit this page for more information: https://skct.edu.in/campus-tour/sports/

patterns: Tell me about the college's autonomy status.
responses: Yes! We are an autonomous university!

patterns: Does the college offer online or distance learning programs?
Can I study online at this college?
Are there any remote learning options available?
responses: Unfortunately, we do not offer any online or distance learning programs.

patterns: What are the key dates for the academic calendar?
When are the holidays and exam periods?
Tell me about the college's academic schedule.
responses: The academic calendar is posted online and includes important dates such as the start and end of terms, holidays, and exam periods.

patterns: Who is the Principal of the College?
Tell me about the college principal
What can you tell me about the principal?
responses: Our principal is Prof. M.G.Sumithra. She has extensive experience in academics and administration, having completed her UG in Electronics and Communication Engineering and PG in Medical Electronics. Her research interests include Information and Communication Engineering and Speech Signal Processing.

patterns: Where can I learn about college placements?
Tell me about the placement opportunities
What are the college's placement records?
responses: We provide a detailed overview of our placements here: https://skct.edu.in/placement/placement-cell/
